data.title: Keith Holyoake on LinkedIn: Turnaround Officer
data.meta_description: We’re hiring! We’re looking for customer focused aviation professionals with aircraft dispatch experience to come and join our incredible team of Turnaround…
data.text:
We’re hiring! We’re looking for customer focused individuals to join our team of Customer Service Agents at Heathrow. Have a look at the link below and get applying! https://lnkd.in/eiFt2Z4X

We’re hiring again! We’re looking for people who are passionate about customers and making a difference to everyone they meet. If you or anyone you know is interested in joining our world class operation at Heathrow Airport as a full time Customer Service Agent please have a look at the link below! https://lnkd.in/ewxJigsv

Another great opportunity to join the Virgin Atlantic family! We’re looking for detail orientated people who can keep calm under pressure to join our amazing Ticket and Support team here at Heathrow Airport
